EmailTemplate.subject: Coming Soon: RIMOWA Never Still bag collection
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr/Mrs {!Contact.LastName},
I hope you are doing well and have enjoyed the holidays!
As we enter the new year, we at RIMOWA are rethinking mobility and the future of travel with our first-ever range of soft bags, the RIMOWA Never Still collection.
The collection officially launches next week, and I thought it would be particularly interesting for you. Attached you will find our RIMOWA Never Still collection lookbook so you can have a closer look, would you be interested in making a reservation?
I remain at your disposal should you need any further information or assistance.
My best,
{!User.Name} RIMOWA {!User.Base_Store_Code__c} Tel:{!User.Mobile} RIMOWA.com
